title: Daughter of Hounds
description: Eight years ago, Emmie Silvey was born on Halloween during a full moon. Raised in Providence by her widower father, she’s a strange, yellow-eyed girl, plagued with visions of impossible worlds and fabulous beings. Inextricably linked with a violent young woman named Soldier, together they must face the monsters and unearthly forces that have shaped their lives…and threaten their futures.
author: Caitlín R. Kiernan
